seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Tripp Launches Kōkua AI as a Mental Wellness Coach  

Tripp has unveiled Kōkua AI, a new AI mental wellness guide designed to provide real-time, personalized emotional support. The tool is now available across multiple platforms, aiming to enhance users' mental well-being through tailored interactions.  

Kōkua AI leverages advanced technology to adapt to individual needs, offering immediate assistance for emotional challenges. This launch marks Tripp's latest effort to integrate AI into mental health solutions.
